Exploration
===========

Project startup
---------------

Setting knitr options.

``` {r knitr_options}
require(knitr)
opts_knit$set(root.dir="..")
opts_chunk$set(fig.path="../graphs/expl-")
```

Load project with ProjectTemplate.

```{r load_project, warning=FALSE}
require('ProjectTemplate')
load.project()
```
